lines.text: The best title for a woman is still "Mrs!".

[to the people at the Zoological Institute]
Live dinosaurs!

[after the "brontosaurus" had destroyed the helicopter]
My radio's gone with it. That's the last of my wire stories, the end of outside contact.

[They have arrived on the plateu]
A great moment in history.

[Talking about the native girl]
She's a hundred pounds of walking dynamite.
